properties.entry: SELECT PRODUCT_NO , CATEGORY , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , STOCK , P_COLOR , P_SIZE , P_MATERIAL , P_DETAIL , DISCOUNT_RATE , FILE_NAME FROM TB_PRODUCT LEFT JOIN TB_IMAGE USING (PRODUCT_NO)
SELECT * FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%?%'

SELECT PRODUCT_NO , CATEGORY , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , STOCK , P_COLOR , P_SIZE , P_MATERIAL , P_DETAIL , DISCOUNT_RATE , FILE_NAME FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_IMAGE USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ?
SELECT FILE_NAME FROM TB_IMAGE WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ? AND IS_THUMBNAIL = 'N'

SELECT PRODUCT_NO , CATEGORY , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , STOCK , P_COLOR , P_SIZE , P_MATERIAL , P_DETAIL , DISCOUNT_RATE , FILE_NAME FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_IMAGE USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE PRODUCT_NO BETWEEN 1 AND 5
